name: PlanEph
short_description:
Planetary Ephemerides
A Dynamic Link Library (DLL) for Microsoft® Windows™
And also an Addin to use with Microsoft® Office™ Excel
Planetary Ephemerides implements several functions to get positions of major and minor planets and artificial satellites, using well known solutions developed and released by development centers as "Jet Propulsion Laboratory" (JPL), Institut De Mécanique Céleste Et De Calcul Des Éphémérides" (IMCCE) and "North American Aerospace Defense Command" (NORAD). It needs binary files to get JPL DEXXX ephemerides and IMCCE INPOPXX ephemerides. The library also implements VSOP87 ephemerides, which do not need any external files. It also implements SGP4/SDP4 ephemerides for artificial satellites, by calling the sgp4 function delivered by David A. Vallado in the book "Fundamentals of Astrodynamics and Applications". The library also gives us positions of minor planets (asteroids and comets) from its orbital elements. It includes SOFA functions call.
summary: Planetary Ephemerides DLL Library for Microsoft Windows and Excel
